Frontend

We are using flask api to host the website. The frontend and backend are connected by rest api. Flask loads the static file and the dynamic content are loaded using the ajax method. For ploting the graph on the webpage, we use plotly js and ajax to get the data from dataend server.

This code is containerized and it can be directly accessed using docker:

docker run -it -p 5000:5000 sumukhbadam/frontend

Below step run provides the IP of the flask you can connect to on your local machine:

docker build . -t tagname docker run -it -p 5000:5000 tagname

templates: This folder has the static webpage elements required for flask

data: This folder houses the data used by the webpage

class couse_eval.course_eval(datafilename: str = 'data/data.csv')

Course eval is used to retrieve the course evaluation data

Parameters

datafilename (str) – path for the data. Defaults to ‘data/data.csv’.

dataobj.py: We use pydantic for data modeling and the data models are defined here.

filter.py: This file has functions used to filter the courses based on inputs.

class filter.Filter(df_path)

Filter class is used to retrieve recommended courses based on input filters

__init__(df_path)

Initialize Filter

Parameters

df_path (str) – directory path of dataframe of all UCSD courses

run(letter=None, gpa=None, time=None, rec_class=None, rec_instr=None, dep=None)

Run the filter and provide recommended courses along with descriptions

Parameters

  • letter – letter grade e.g. A-, B+, A+

  • gpa (float) – 3.2, 3.8

  • time (float) – weekly study hours e.g. 10, 20

  • rec_class (float) – probability for class to be recommended in [0, 1]

  • rec_instr (float) – probability for instructor to be recommended in [0, 1]

  • dep (List[str]) – list of department codes e.g. CSE, ECE, PHIL

Returns

dataframe of recommended courses

Letter.py: This file has mapping from the grade to points

class Letter.Letter(letter)

Letter class stores comparison among various letter grades

__init__(letter)

Initialize Letter class

Parameters

letter (str) – letter grade e.g. A-, B+, A+
